256921.「では 大魔王を裏切り\n 我らに 味方するというのか？\n にわかには 信じら:
So you're betraying the Demon Lord and
siding with us? I find that hard to believe...

256922.「あんな どこの馬の骨とも知れない若造に\n 大魔王の座をくれてやるなんて 冗談:
It's no joke to give the title of Demon Lord
to some youngster from who knows where.
No chance I'm wagging my tail for them.

256923.「アンタたちにとっても 悪い話じゃないだろ？\n 目ざわりな大魔王を 俺たちの手:
It's not a bad deal for you, right? Let's make
that annoying Demon Lord disappear
ourselves, shall we?

256925.「誰か 助けて……。\n ここから 出して……。: Somebody help me... get me out of here...

256927.「キミは……？\n 優しくて あたたかな光を感じる……。: Are you...? I feel a gentle, warm light...

256930.「目が覚めたら 知らないところにいて……\n あの恐ろしい連中につかまって ここ:
I woke up in a strange place... and those
horrible people grabbed me and put me here...

256931.「自分の名前以外 何も 思いだせない……。\n 僕は いったい……？:
I can't remember anything but my own name...
Who am I...?

256932.「あーぁ。やっと終わったぜ。 \n すっかり 待たせちまったみたいだな。:
Ahhh. It's finally over. Looks like I kept you
waiting.

256933.「そいつが ヤツらの言う いけにえの人間か。\n 戦勝祈願に いけにえを捧げる儀:
That guy must be the sacrificial human they were talking about before. They have a ceremony where they offer up sacrifices to
pray for victory. How old-fashioned...

256934.「……なんか 話してたみたいだったが\n アンタの 知り合いかい？:
...I thought I heard you two talking earlier.
Is he someone you know?

256935.「……なるほどねぇ。\n アストルティアから 迷いこんだのかもな。\n たまーに:
...I see. Maybe he wandered in here from
Astoltia. You occasionally get people like
that. Buncha morons is what they are.

256937.「おっと 今はコイツのことはいい。\n 本題に入ろう。:
Oops, forget about this guy for now. Let's get
down to business.

256938.「ヤツら まんまと引っかかってくれたぜ。\n 天下のバルディスタ軍と 俺様の智謀:
They've got it all figured out. They think
with both Valdista's army and my wits at their
back, they've practically already won.

256939.「大魔王城を攻める前に 決起集会を\n 開くらしくてな。反乱の首謀者を始め\n:
They're going to hold a rally before they attack the Demon Lord's castle. The ringleader of the rebellion and other key
figures are going to be there.

256940.「そこを 協力者と見せかけた バルディスタ兵が\n 一気にたたく！ アンタも 大:
Valdistan soldiers, pretending to be collaborators, will crush them all at once! And you, Demon Lord, can feel free to go
wild on them.

256941.「……残念だが コイツは このままだ。\n しばらく いけにえのまま いてもらう:
...Unfortunately, we need to leave him here.
He'll have to stay as a sacrificial lamb for
the time being.

256942.「戦勝祈願の儀式とやらが 終わる前までに\n 助けてやれば 文句ないだろ？\n:
I'm sure you won't complain if we wait until
after the rally to free him. We can't afford
to cause a scene now.

256943.「決起集会は ジャリムバハ砂漠の\n 北西にある 砂塵の遺跡で開かれるらしい。\:
The rally is supposed to be held at Sandstorm
Ruins, northwest of Jyarimbaha Desert. Let's
head there.

256944.「ここから先は 何が起きるか わからねえ。\n しっかり 準備しとけよ？\n く:
There's no telling what will happen from here,
so make sure you're prepared. Don't do
anything you'll regret...

256947.「魔界解放軍の 同志たちよ！\n 我らは 同じ旗のもとに……:
Comrades of the Demon World Liberation Army!
We are united under...

256949.「魔界解放軍 バンザーーーイ！！: Long live the Demon World Liberation Army!!

256950.「……うるさァーーーいッ！\n 人の話は 最後まで静かに 聞かんかッ！！:
...SHUUUUTTT UUUUUUUUPP!! Listen to me when
I'm talkin', will ya!?

256952.「魔界解放軍の 同志たちよ！\n 我らは 同じ旗のもとに集った！\n 大魔王を討:
Comrades of the Demon World Liberation Army!
We are united under the same banner! For the
purpose of defeating the Demon Lord!

256953.「バルディスタの参謀 ベルトロどのも\n 我が軍の志に賛同くださり ご加盟いただ:
Valdista's second-in-command, Comrade Bertro,
has agreed to join us! With his help, victory
will be ours!

256954.「我らは 大魔王を倒し 魔界を解放する！\n どこの馬の骨かも わからんヤツに\:
We will defeat the Demon Lord and liberate the Demon World! We will not leave it in the hands of some nobody who came from out
of nowhere!

256955.「大魔王の座は 真に魔界を憂う者…… \n このゴッツェにこそ ふさわしい！\n:
The Demon Lord should be someone who truly cares about the Demon World...someone like me, Gotze! I will lead the Demon World to
a prosperous future!

256956.「さぁ！ 我らの勝利を祈願して\n いけにえを 捧げるのだ！:
Come! Let us offer up our sacrifice as we pray
for victory!

256957.「……ベルトロどの！\n これは いったい どういうことだ！？:
...Comrade Bertro! What is the meaning of
this!?

256958.「どういうことも 何も\n テメーらが 間抜けだってだけさ。:
What this means is that you're all a bunch of
morons.

256959.「我らバルディスタが 仕えるのは\n 魔王ヴァレリアと こちらにいらっしゃる\n:
We Valdistans serve only Demon Queen Valeria,
and the Demon Lord here.

256960.「テメーらに振る しっぽなんて\n 最っ初から 持ち合わせちゃいねェんだよ。\n:
I was never gonna roll over for you guys from
the very beginning. Idiot.

256962.「……これが 俗にいう 絶体絶命というやつか。\n だが まだ 負けたわけではな:
...This is one of those worst-case scenarios.
But we haven't lost yet! If I defeat you here,
victory will still be ours!

256965.「見ろ！ この姿を！\n 俺こそが！ 真の大魔王だァァァ！！:
Look upon this form! I am the TRUE Demon
Lord!!

256967.「魔瘴をあびて ピンピンしてやがる……！\n あのガキ いったい何者なんだ？:
He's still alive after all that demon
miasma...! Who the hell is that kid?

256968.「おっと こうしちゃいられねえ。\n ここから先は アンタの仕事だ。:
Oops, this is no time for that. This is your
show, now.

256969.「見りゃわかるだろ？\n あんな おっかないの 俺には荷が重すぎる。\n アンタ:
Have you seen that thing? It's way too much
for someone like me to handle on my own. Let's
see what you can do.

256970.「偉大なる 大魔王様！\n 愚かなる反逆者に 制裁を！:
O Demon Lord! Time for you to bury that
foolish traitor!

256971.「……せっかく あの道化師から\n 特別製の魔瘴石を もらったのに。\n くぅぅ:
...I even went through the trouble of getting
a special Miasmite from that clown. Kgghhh...!

256972.「………で？\n 一応 謀反の理由を 聞かせてもらおうか？:
...So? Shall we hear the reason for this
little insurrection, for the heck of it?

256973.「理由だと！？ 理由なんて ソイツが\n 大魔王になったからに 決まってるじゃな:
Reason!? The reason's obviousーbecause THAT
guy became the Demon Lord!

256974.「ヴァレリアとかアスバルとか 大魔王になるなら\n そういう大物だと 思ってた。:
I thought that either Valeria or Asbal were going to become the Demon Lord. I didn't go to the Demongate because I thought I
wouldn't stand a chance against them.

256975.「それなのに フタを開けてみたら！\n コイツみたいな ぽっと出の地味なヤツが\:
But then when I finally poke my head out, I
find out a simpleton like THEM became the
Demon Lord!?

256976.「コイツが なれるなら \n 誰が大魔王になったって いいじゃん！\n 俺がなっ:
If they can become the Demon Lord, then
who cares who gets the job!? It could even be
me!

256977.「俺だって！ 大魔王に！\n なりたかったんだよぉぉぉぉーーーーーッ！！:
I! Wanted! To be! The Demon Lord!!
Toooooo!!!

256978.「……だが 戦ってみて わかった。\n コイツは ただの 地味顔じゃない。\n:
...But when I fought 'em, I understood. This
guy's not some simple-faced fool...they're
the real deal!

256980.「じゃ 大魔王様！\n コイツら ひと思いに やっちゃってください！:
Now then, Demon Lord! Time to take out
the trash!

256981.「ひえええ……命だけは 勘弁してください！\n 俺たち 心を入れ替えます！\n:
Eeeek! P-please don't kill me! We've changed
our minds! We pledge our allegiance to ya!
Please!!

256983.「うわぁーーん！ そんなこと 言わないで！\n なんでもしますから！ この通り！:
Uwaahh! D-don't say that! I'll do anythin' ya
want! Please!! <yesno><close>

256984.「大魔王……いや 大魔王様！\n 敵であった俺たちに 情けをかけるなんて\n な:
Demon Lord... No... O mighty Demon Lord!
How graceful of ya to show mercy to us,
your enemies!

256985.「あなたは 俺たちの 恩人です！\n 一生 あなたに ついていきます！:
You're our savior! We'll follow you for the
rest of our lives!

256986.「大魔王様 バンザイ！\n 偉大なる その名に 栄光あれ！:
Long live the Demon Lord! Glory to their
great name!

256987.「……ここだけの話。ちょっとだけ\n 部下といっしょに 反乱軍に\n 寝返っちま:
...Just between you and me, I actually was
considering joining the rebels with my men for
a bit.

256988.「だが 今日の働きっぷりを見て\n 寝返らなくて正解だったと 確信したね。\n:
But after seeing how hard you worked today, I'm convinced I was right not to turn on you. You'll make for a moderately competent Demon
Lord.

256989.「さーて……問題はコイツだな。\n えっと ナラジアとか いったっけか？:
Now then... the next problem is this guy.
You said your name was Narasia, right?

256990.「お前 本当に 何者なんだ？\n あれだけの魔瘴を浴びて 平気でいられるなんて\:
Who are you, really? I find it hard to believe
that a mere human can be exposed to that much
miasma and come out unfazed...

256991.「……本当に 僕は 何も覚えていないんだ。\n でも あの不気味な霧を見て\n:
I really don't remember anything. But that
eerie fog reminded me of one thing...

256992.「ここに来る前 深い霧の中に 僕らはいた。\n 僕は ひとりでは なかったんだ…:
Before I came here, I was in a deep fog. But I
wasn't alone...

256993.「僕に そっくりな女の子……\n あの子がいたから 僕は…………。:
There was a girl who looked just like me...
and she was the reason I...

256994.「そういや コイツ よく見ると\n 魔瘴の巫女に そっくりだよな。\n ……たし:
Oh yeah, if you look close enough, this guy
looks just like the Maiden of Miasma... her
name was Illusia, right?

256996.「まあ ここで 考えてもしかたないか。\n どう見ても 害はなさそうだしな。:
Well, I think that's enough pondering for now.
He seems harmless enough.

256997.「大魔王様は 当分 忙しいんだろ？\n とりあえず バルディスタで預かっとくわ。:
You're busy being the Demon Lord, aren't
you? Then I'll keep him over at Valdista for
now.

256998.「よーし！ ナラジアくーん。\n オジサンと いっしょに来てもらおうか……:
All right, Mr. Narasia! I'm gonna need you to
come along with this old man and...

257000.「アイツ どこ行きやがった！: Where the hell did he go!?

257001.「ちくしょーッ！ あのガキ！\n ただでさえ 忙しいってのに\n 面倒事 増やし:
Damn it! That kid! He's just adding to the
hassle of my busy life!

257002.「……このまま ほっといて\n 死なれても 寝覚めがわりぃ。\n アイツのことは:
...If he ends up wandering off and getting
himself killed, I won't be able to sleep at
night. I'll have my men look for him.

257003.「ほれ！ アンタは とっとと\n ヴァレリアに 報告に行けよ。\n あんまり待た:
Come on, then! You should go report to Valeria
right away. You'll get hurt if you keep her
waiting too long.
